alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued April 12 at 12:19PM CDT until April 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing dust is a possibility this afternoon. Visibility reductions between one quarter mile and one mile will be possible in localized areas of blowing dust. * WHERE...In Kansas, Phillips and Rooks Counties. In Nebraska, Dawson, Gosper, Phelps, Furnas and Harlan Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust has been reported as occurring in Furnas County. A plume of dust is moving from southwest to northeast into the area which could result in some reductions to visibility. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.
